alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Noxubee and northern Kemper Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 559 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Macon, or 15 miles northeast of Preston, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gholson around 620 PM CDT. Preston around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Shuqualak and Scooba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
